text: is a Japanese dancer and actor, he is a member of the Japanese group The Rampage from Exile Tribe. == Career == Makoto attended EXPG (Exile Professional Gym) of Tokyo and auditioned for The Rampage via Global Japan Challenge. In September 2014, he became an official member of the group. As a child he featured in some EXILE music videos and also used to be a Generations from Exile Tribe support member from 2011 to 2013. He is one of the members of a Krump dance crew "Rag Pound" with fellow members Kaisei Takechi and Kazuma Kawamura. In October 2018, he made his acting debut with drama "Prince Of Legend". In September 2019, Makoto played in the YouTube web drama Shujin-kō (主人公). == Works == === Choreography === {| class="wikitable" |+Group choreography !Year !Title !Notes !Ref. |- | rowspan="2" |2018 |Dream On |Alongside Takahide Suzuki | |- |Hard Hit |Alongside Shogo Yamamoto and Kaisei Takechi | |} == Filmography == === TV series === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Network !Ref. |- |2018 |Prince of Legend | rowspan="2" |Riku Odajima |NTV | |- |2019 |Kizoku Tanjou -Prince Of Legend- |NTV | |} === Movies === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Ref. |- |2019 |Prince of Legend | rowspan="2" |Riku Odajima | |- |2020 |Kizoku Kourin -Prince Of Legend- | |} === Web Dramas === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Network !Ref. |- |2019 | |Yujiro Ikeda |YouTube | |} === Music Videos === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Artist !Title |- | rowspan="3" |2011 |Exile |Each Other’s Way~Tabi no Tochuu~ |- |Exile |24karats STAY GOLD (kids & girls ver.) |- |Exile |VICTORY |- |2012 |Generations from Exile Tribe |Brave It Out |- | rowspan="3" |2013 |Generations from Exile Tribe |Animal |- |Generations from Exile Tribe |Love You More |- |Generations from Exile Tribe |Hot Shot |- |2014 |Exile Tribe |24karats TRIBE OF GOLD |} === Game === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Notes |- |2019 |Prince Of Legend Love Royale |Riku Odajima |Released on March 25 Available on iOS / Android |} == References == == External Links == * The Rampage Official Website Category:1998 births Category:Japanese male actors Category:Japanese male dancers Category:LDH (company) artists Category:Living people Category:People from Kanagawa Prefecture
